sources.name: Employees1
sources.description: Source employees file, changes every day
sources.script:
source(output(
		EmpID as string,
		Region as string,
		Status as string,
		Function as string,
		Level as string,
		Role as string,
		StartDate as string,
		EndDate as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	purgeFiles: true,
	wildcardPaths:['SampleData/Emps/today/*.csv']) ~> Employees1

sources.name: DimEmployees
sources.description: Current rows in DimEmployees DW table
sources.script:
source(output(
		EmpID as integer,
		surrogatekey as string,
		Region as string,
		Status as string,
		EmpFunction as string,
		Level as string,
		Role as string,
		StartDate as date,
		EndDate as date,
		iscurrent as integer,
		processtime as timestamp
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false) ~> DimEmployees

sinks.name: sinkInactive
sinks.script:
AlterRow1 sink(mapColumn(
		EmpID,
		EndDate,
		iscurrent,
		processtime
	),
	partitionBy('roundRobin', 4)) ~> sinkInactive

transformations.name: TypeConversionsAndSetAttrs
transformations.script:
NullFilter derive(EmpID = toInteger(EmpID),
		StartDate = toDate(StartDate,'MM/dd/yyyy'),
		EndDate = toDate(EndDate,'MM/dd/yyyy'),
		processtime = currentTimestamp()) ~> TypeConversionsAndSetAttrs

transformations.name: LookupIDs
transformations.script:
TypeConversionsAndSetAttrs, TypeConversions lookup(TypeConversionsAndSetAttrs@EmpID == TypeConversions@EmpID,
	broadcast: 'none')~> LookupIDs

transformations.name: ConditionalSplit1
transformations.script:
NormNames split(isNull(iscurrent),
	disjoint: false) ~> ConditionalSplit1@(NewRow, CheckForUpdates)

transformations.name: checkForChanges
transformations.script:
NameNorm2, TypeConversions exists(NameNorm2@EmpID == TypeConversions@EmpID &&

(

NameNorm2@Region != DimEmployees@Region ||
NameNorm2@Role != DimEmployees@Role ||
NameNorm2@Level != DimEmployees@Level ||
NameNorm2@Status != DimEmployees@Status

),
	negate:false,
	broadcast: 'none')~> checkForChanges

transformations.name: NormNames
transformations.script:
LookupIDs select(mapColumn(
		EmpID = TypeConversionsAndSetAttrs@EmpID,
		Region = Employees1@Region,
		Status = Employees1@Status,
		Level = Employees1@Level,
		Role = Employees1@Role,
		StartDate = TypeConversionsAndSetAttrs@StartDate,
		EndDate = TypeConversionsAndSetAttrs@EndDate,
		EmpFunction = Function,
		iscurrent,
		processtime = TypeConversionsAndSetAttrs@processtime,
		surrogatekey
	))~> NormNames

transformations.name: InactiveFields
transformations.script:
SetAttrsInactive select(mapColumn(
		EmpID,
		Status,
		EndDate,
		iscurrent,
		processtime
	))~> InactiveFields

transformations.name: NullFilter
transformations.description: Filter out NULLs from source file

transformations.name: NameNorm2
transformations.script:
ConditionalSplit1@CheckForUpdates select(mapColumn(
		EmpID,
		Region,
		Status,
		Level,
		Role,
		StartDate,
		EndDate,
		EmpFunction,
		iscurrent,
		processtime,
		surrogatekey
	))~> NameNorm2
